sentences.sContent: It will take time to assimilate all these facts.
sentences.sCn: 充分掌握所有这些情况需要时间。

sentences.sContent: There is every sign that new Asian-Americans are just as willing to assimilate.
sentences.sCn: 各种迹象表明新的亚裔美籍人简直一样愿意被同化。

synos.tran: 吸收；使同化；把…比作；使相似

remMethod.val: as+simil(相同)+ate(使)→使相同→(使或被)同化

words.tran: 同化的；同化力的；同化作用的
同化；吸收；[生化] 同化作用

trans.tranCn: 吸收，消化；被吸收；被同化
trans.tranOther: to completely understand and begin to use new ideas, information etc
